description: This data-set is a listing of all active City of Edmonton Administration job titles, complete with salary range and number of positions. Data Owner: Human Resources. Frequency: Data is updated semi-annually. Note - More than one (1) employee can be in a position.

name: City of Edmonton Administration - Salary Ranges by Job Title
